name: Cookie Clicker (itch) (Cameron G)
description:
This was the first game I created when I was in college. It is a simple cookie clicker game buy in the process of making it I learnt many of the core skills needed for developing in unity. The game is UI based 2D. Although this was my first game it includes some advanced features like save games using playerprefs.

Known issues:

  • The UI does not scale correctly past 1080p
